articles.description: MOTD pundit and Newcastle United legend Alan Shearer explains why his old club have had a pre-season to forget, and how Liverpool target Alexander Isak could stay at St James' Park.
articles.title: Alan Shearer: Newcastle's 'nightmare' - how can they resolve Alexander Isak issue and rescue their transfer window?

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu pushes world number one Aryna Sabalenka but falls short of a statement win at the Cincinnati Open.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu edged out by Aryna Sabalenka in Cincinnati Open classic

articles.description: Crystal Palace's demotion to the Conference League could "galvanise" the club this season, says Chris Sutton on the Monday Night Club.
articles.title: Crystal Palace: Conference League demotion could 'galvanise' club, says Chris Sutton

articles.description: Everton are progressing in talks to sign Jack Grealish on a season-long loan deal from Manchester City.
articles.title: Jack Grealish: Everton talks progress over Manchester City winger

articles.description: Jess Carter feared team-mate Lauren James would suffer "astronomical" racist abuse had she been the only England player to miss in the Euro 2025 shootout with Sweden.
articles.title: Jess Carter feared Lionesses team-mate Lauren James would suffer 'astronomical' racist abuse

articles.description: Manchester City are considering a move for Rodrygo, Forest are close to signing James McAtee, Chelsea and RB Leipzig discuss Christopher Nkunku, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Rodrygo, Nkunku, Simons, Isak, McAtee, Grealish, Konate, Trippier, Kalimuendo

articles.description: Spain's women's national team announce Sonia Bermudez as Montse Tome's replacement.
articles.title: Montse Tome: Spain part ways with head coach and appoint Sonia Bermudez as successor

articles.description: The Spanish FA approves plans to host December's La Liga match between Villarreal and Barcelona in the USA.
articles.title: Spanish FA approves plans to play Villarreal-Barcelona La Liga match in USA

articles.description: Arthur Rinderknech collapses on court in sweltering conditions during his Cincinnati Open match with Felix Auger-Aliassime, before retiring.
articles.title: Cincinnati Open: Arthur Rinderknech collapses on court in hot conditions

articles.description: Tottenham express interest in signing Brazil winger Savinho during talks with Manchester City.
articles.title: Tottenham open talks with Manchester City to sign Brazil winger Savinho
